name: Terrashaper
description:
Dear players,

the game presented on this page is Terrashaper, a simple city-building and terraforming game with a low-poly aesthetic. In this game you will be free to design and shape a terrain to your liking and populate it with buildings, streets, props, foliage and people. You have full artistic freedom to create and express yourself in any way you like. The first time you play the game, it will be on a timer (15 minutes). After finishing one game session and restarting, no timer restrictions will be present anymore.

I have developed this game in the context of a user study that investigates in-game player behavior. Since this is part of an ongoing study, certain player data will be collected and send to me. Therefore, here is some information regarding data usage and study participation: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1WcTgnTBh8KDoVmr0id1qz6tR700vXIM0cCe4HbseNzM/...

By downloading and playing the game, you confirm that you have read the information linked above and feel adequately informed about participating in this study.  You are aware that participation is voluntary and that you can withdraw from participation at any time without giving reasons. Withdrawal has no further consequences. All data collected up to then will be deleted. You agree that the data collected in the study can be analyzed scientifically and then published anonymously.

If you have any further comments or anything you like to share regarding this game, feel free to reach out to my via this page or twitter (https://twitter.com/virtuaGeorge)

Thank you so much for your time and participation :)
